cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the capacity region of Gaussian MIMO broadcast channels, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves optimization algorithms and convex formulations, which are relevant to machine learning (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SI). The use of alternating optimization and successive convex approximation is a common technique in network optimization (cs.NI). Finally, the paper presents numerical results, which could fall under the category of machine learning or statistics (cs.LG).
